# Outline

By then end of bootcamp you will be able to read in data, wrangling data, and visualize data. The 

Here is an example of what you'll be able to do by the end

- read in data from an online source or manage a downloaded data file
- determine the steps needed to wrangling a dataset
- make appropiate visualizations


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data1 <- read_csv("datasets/StudentsPerformance.csv")
# View(data1)
```

```{r}
data2 <- data1 %>% 
    group_by(lunch, `race/ethnicity`) %>% 
    summarise("Avg Math" = mean(`math score`), "Std Math" = sd(`math score`))
view(data2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data2, aes())
```
